english: There at began a feeble scratching outside
chinese: 接着，外面开始了一个轻微的刮擦声。
钥匙的刮擦纹路毁掉了车漆。

english: Kelp scrape ? we ' re having a special
chinese: 海藻刮擦?我们有特价喔

english: This prevents scratching and tearing as well as grease and grime build up
chinese: 这能防止其被刮擦、扯裂并污垢的堆积。

english: Its a scratching noise , like someones fingernails against your window
chinese: 那是一个刮擦声，就像是有人用指甲刮你的窗户。
刮擦造句挺难的，這是一个万能造句的方法

english: You couldn ' t hear the music because of all the hisses and scratches on the record
chinese: 你没法听到音乐，因为唱片发出嘶嘶沙沙的刮擦声。

english: The final modification was the addition of a small compass to the necklace cord
chinese: 每次刮擦这条打火石都会产生大量高温火花而用以取火。

english: Using tatty , worn , dirty , or scratchy wash mitts , sponges , drying towels etc
chinese: 使用破旧的、脏的或者有刮擦声的洗车毛巾、海棉、干毛巾等。

english: Real jade is always cool to the touch and will resist any scratch with metal
chinese: 真玉摸上去总有凉润之感，而且不怕金属刮擦，刮后也不留痕迹。

english: With the floss scrape up and down and clean each tooth while move to the unused end gradually
chinese: 3清洁整个牙使用牙线上下刮擦，清洁每一个牙。

english: The squeak of train wheels and scraping during a spot of diy have us reaching for earplugs
chinese: 火车的刹车声和金属相互刮擦的声音让人恨不得用耳塞堵住耳朵。

english: Thereat began a feeble scratching outside , and the pile of books moved as if thrust forward
chinese: 接着，外面开始了一个轻微的刮擦声，那堆书也挪动了，仿佛有人把它推开似的。

english: Less than 16 milli - seconds durability , scratch - resistance ; bear more than 50 million times of single point touches
chinese: 耐久性抗刮擦，可承受超过50 000 000次以上的单点触摸

english: Testing methods for paints - part 5 : mechanical property of film - section 4 : scratch hardness pencil method erratum 2
chinese: 涂料试验方法.第5部分:薄膜的机械特性.第4节:刮擦硬度
